name: deal.II with candi
description: Installs deal.II using candi (Compile & Install) with comprehensive package support including Trilinos, PETSc, p4est, HDF5, and more

dealiiVersion.description: Select the version of deal.II to install

installPath.description: Installation path for deal.II and dependencies

cleanBuild.description: Use fresh build directory by removing existing ones

enableTrilinos.description: Install Trilinos via candi for advanced linear algebra operations (WARNING: Known compatibility issues - system packages used by default)

trilinosWithComplex.description: Configure Trilinos with complex number support (requires more RAM and time)

enablePetsc.description: Install PETSc via candi for parallel linear algebra (WARNING: Known SCALAPACK/CMake compatibility issues - system packages used by default)

enableSlepc.description: Install SLEPc via candi for eigenvalue problems (WARNING: Requires candi PETSc - system packages used by default)

enableP4est.description: Install p4est for adaptive mesh refinement

enableOpencascade.description: Install OpenCASCADE for CAD file support (WARNING: Known compatibility issues with modern systems - use system packages instead)

enableParmetis.description: Install ParMETIS via candi for mesh partitioning (WARNING: Known compatibility issues - system packages used by default)

enableSundials.description: Install SUNDIALS via candi for ODE/DAE solving (WARNING: Known compatibility issues - system packages used by default)

enableSuperluDist.description: Install SuperLU_DIST for distributed sparse direct solvers

enableGinkgo.description: Install Ginkgo for GPU-accelerated linear algebra

enableMumps.description: Install MUMPS for sparse direct solvers

enableNetcdf.description: Install NetCDF for scientific data I/O

enableOpenblas.description: Install OpenBLAS for optimized linear algebra

enableScalapack.description: Install ScaLAPACK for distributed linear algebra

enableGit.description: Install Git version control system via candi

enableCmake.description: Install CMake build system via candi

enableAstyle.description: Install Astyle code formatter for development

mklDir.description: Path to Intel MKL installation (if enableMkl is true)

developerMode.description: Enable developer mode to avoid package fetch and unpack

instantCleanBuild.description: Remove build directory after successful installation

instantCleanSrc.description: Remove downloaded source files after successful installation

instantCleanUnpack.description: Remove unpacked source files after successful installation
